Reviews.Title: Good Basic Film SLR
Reviews.Author: stephenkarkos
Reviews.Content: Takes great pictures. Depth-of-field feature is a great tool. Easy to overdo shot preview and take an accidental shot. Relearning that film advance is needed after usingdigital cameras. Looking for a good zoom and flash,

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Gemini
Reviews.Content: Hi.  I have received my camera.  Easy to figure everything out.  I have not had a chance to use it yet.  So far, looks nice. Look forward to telling more in the very near future!  Purchased through Amazon.  Thanks, Amazon

ProductInfo.Features:
35mm SLR, ideal for students
Manual Focus & Exposure
Manual Loading/Advance/Rewind
Accepts Pentax K Lenses
Includes Fitted Case
ProductInfo.Name: Vivitar SLR Camera - Black (VIV-V3800-50)
